text: Pajomʙaronaşon guftand: «Ojo dar Xudo — on ofarinandai osmonhovu zamin — şakke hast? Şumoro da'vat mekunad, to gunohonatonro ʙiʙaxşad va to muddate muajjan şumoro zinda guzorad». Guftand: «Şumo mardumone monandi mo hasted. Mexohed moro az on cī padaronamon meparastidand, ʙozdored. Baroi mo dalele ravşan ʙijovared!»
